resources.string: How the app works:Please use the navigation bar in order to access each page. To log a food item that was just bought go to the find food item screen. There you will be prompted to enter the food item and then press the button to search for the food item. You will then be prompted to enter an expiration date and select where the food item belongs (fridge/pantry). To look up a recipe, please visit the find recipe screen. There you will enter a recipe you are looking for and a page with all recipes you can make based on the food you have will be displayed. You also can visit recipes and view them on the view recipe page.

This app was created to help people avoid wasting food and those who are passionate about cooking! As college students, we wanted to make cooking easy and manageable. This app helps users cook with what they have, whcih is especially helpful when it comes to living at school with a limited food in our kitchens.
App created by Jonathan Mason, Emily Balboni and Amber Kusma
